title: Want to upgrade my T206 Greminger, Ryan, and LaFitte with a Hindu back
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: Want to upgrade my T206 Greminger, Ryan, and LaFitte with a Hindu back
posts.post_content:
looking to upgrade these 3 SLer's.. interested in hindu backs only.

also looking for Foster, thornton, and scoops with a hindu back in any condition.

please email me if you have any of these 6 cards for sale/trade.

Jamie
